name: Cape's Escape Game 5th Room
storyline: Whew, that was a long day! Tired, the Cape jumped into his futon bed. Hoping to go on a date with Todomi in his dreams, he fell fast asleep. He didn't even notice the ghost staring at him in the darkness... This time, Cape gets trapped in an escape game in his dreams. An old friend of Cape's makes an appearance, shedding light on Cape's mysterious past... err, sorta?
summary: Cape's Escape Game 5th Room is a short adventure game in the Cape's Escape series, which you can complete in an hour or so. Solve the mystery and breakout from the escape game of Cape's dreams.
